short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VivaVideo is an Easy-to-use Video Editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VivaVideo is an Easy-to-use Video Editor Video Maker for creating mind-blowing videos! Our editing app includes all the tools you need to edit videos and add eye-catching transitions.

With powerful features like AI effects, keyframe editing, and curve speed adjustments, both amateurs and pros can make videos that stand out. Download VivaVideo and take your editing to the next level!
